section.title: Take Back Control of Your Data
section.description: Traditional solutions compromise your privacy. Hashguard offers an alternative without compromise.

items.title: Exposed Data
items.details: Data stored on traditional clouds is subject to the laws of the hosting country, potentially compromising their confidentiality.

items.title: Loss of Control
items.details: Traditional cloud providers can access your files and are subject to government requests.

items.title: Commercial Exploitation
items.details: Cloud giants often analyze your data for advertising and commercial purposes.

items.title: Censorship Risk
items.details: Centralized services are vulnerable to censorship and can be forced to monitor activities.

items.title: Total Dependence
items.details: Being tied to a single provider limits your options and exposes you to price increases.

items.title: 100% Sovereign Storage
items.details: Your data remains exclusively on European infrastructure, ensuring GDPR compliance.

items.title: Exclusive Ownership
items.details: You alone possess the encryption keys. Even Hashguard cannot access your data.

items.title: No Commercial
items.details: Your data is strictly private and is never analyzed or used for commercial purposes.

items.title: Censorship Resistant
items.details: Decentralization makes any form of unauthorized censorship or surveillance impossible.

items.title: Intuitive Interface
items.details: Enjoy Web3 benefits with an interface as simple as traditional cloud storage.
